The Science & Story Behind It

The consistency of ‘Green-Marble’ is rooted in its unique reproductive biology and selected morphological traits.

  • The parthenogenetic reproduction ensures every offspring is genetically identical to the parent, guaranteeing consistent marbled patterning, growth rate, and flavor profile across the entire population.
  • The dwarf size is a naturally occurring trait in this clonal line that has been stabilized through selective culling of larger variants, creating a population that reliably matures at the desired plate size.
  • The vibrant green marbling is the result of selective breeding for specific chromatophore distribution and density, creating the distinctive appearance while maintaining the hardiness required for aquaculture.

In short, Mini Crayfish ‘Green-Marble’ is a self-sustaining, visually striking, and flavor-authentic cultivar, a clonal marvel that provides both endless fascination and a reliable harvest of sweet, succulent crustacean meat from a compact urban system.
